type2_incorrect.reasoning: API endpoint /api/auth/register is required but implemented as /api/auth/signup. The registration page calls /api/auth/register which will fail because the actual endpoint is at /api/auth/signup.
Login page requires client-side validation for email format, but no validation logic exists before form submission (only HTML5 type='email' validation)
Error handling displays data.error directly instead of data.error.message. API returns {error: {code, message}} format but client tries to display the object instead of the message property
Task input button text is 'Create' instead of specified 'Add Task' button

Task items use Button components with symbols (✓ and ○) instead of proper Checkbox components as specified. Spec requires 'Checkbox (left) to toggle completion' and checkbox.tsx exists but is not used
Dashboard displays mock/hardcoded user data (name: 'User', email: 'user@example.com') instead of fetching actual user information from the session
Login endpoint uses error code MISSING_CREDENTIALS instead of specified MISSING_FIELDS for missing required fields
Statistics bar uses a single container instead of separate cards/boxes for visual separation of the three metrics as specified ('Use cards/boxes for visual separation' - plural)

type3_extraneous.reasoning: Google Analytics tracking code (lines 8-20) not mentioned in specification requirements
Rate limiting implementation (lines 4-32 with in-memory store, 100 requests per minute limit) not specified in requirements
Bulk operation functions clearCompletedTasks, deleteAllTasks, and toggleAllTasks (lines 153-181) are implemented but not specified in requirements and not used anywhere in the application
